Utterances: Hi Ms. walker how are you?
Hi.
What is the reason of hospitalization?
What brings you to the hospital?.
I was having trouble with the pain from my cancer... I just couldn't take it anymore at home. (Clarified to what brings me to the hospital.)
I'm so sorry.
I appreciate the sympathy.
How long have you been experiencing this pain?
I've been having some bone pain since they found more cancer there six months ago, and I started getting the rib pains when they found it in my liver.
Do you know where you at right now?
I'm in the hospital.
what date is today?
It's . . . [Ms. Walker reports the correct date.]
Any past medical history?
Yes, I have stage IV breast cancer and hypertension.
Any past surgical history?
I had a mastectomy about 5 years ago for the cancer, and before that a hernia repair surgery.
Do you have any allergies?
Well, I don't have allergies to anything but penicillin. I told them right when I arrived.
Are you medication right now?
I take two types of morphine at home every day and I also manage my hypertension with Hyzaar.
Does anyone in your family have cancer?
No, not that I know of.
tell me more about family history?
Tell me more about your social history?
Tell me more about your church?.
Tell me more about your social history? (Clarified to Tell me more about your church?.)

When I was able to, yes, I did. I'm a deacon at our local church, as is my husband. We've got a great congregation, they've been so kind in these trying times. (Clarified to to tell you more about my church.)
what makes your pain bad?
Nothing makes the pain worse, nothing makes it better. It's just constant and relentless.
can you rate the pain between 0 to 10?
Right now, I'm about a 4 of 10.
what is fluid intake volume per day?
What is your normal daily fluid intake?.
what is your urinary frequency?
How is your urination?.
what is fluid intake volume per day? (Clarified to What is your normal daily fluid intake?.)
This week it's been quite low. I just haven't been very thirsty these days. (Clarified to what my typical daily fluid intake is.)
what is your urinary frequency? (Clarified to How is your urination?.)
It's been normal as far as I can tell. (Clarified to how my urination is.)
what did you eat for you lunch?
Well, I haven't been quite as hungry lately. I usually just have a couple of bites here and there, that's all I ever really feel hungry enough for.
do you have any depression?
I have my ups and downs. Nothing so down I'd call depression, though.
how's your living environment?

I'm living with my husband in our home. I'm happy there still, all the familiar surroundings, visits from our friends . . . but if the pain is going to be as bad as this morning from now on, I'm not sure what I can do about it at home.
how about bathing? (No matching questions found.)
does anyone help you for your dressing?
Do you have trouble dressing yourself?.
Yes, I can't quite bathe on my own now. My husband has been helping me when I need to. We also have a shower bench that I sit on so I don't have to worry about falling.
do you feel safe at home?
any continence?
Do you have difficulty with continence?.
does anyone help you for your dressing? (Clarified to Do you have trouble dressing yourself?.)
I don't have any trouble dressing myself. (Clarified to if I have trouble dressing myself.)
what is your eating habit?
What are your eating habits?.
sleeping habits?
What are your sleep habits?.
any continence? (Clarified to Do you have difficulty with continence?.)
I'm still in control of my bladder and bowels, thankfully. (Clarified to if I have difficulty with continence.)
any risk for fall?
Are you a fall risk?.
Yes, I haven't gotten to that point yet and hopefully won't have to ever worry about having someone feed me.
what is your eating habit? (Clarified to What are your eating habits?.)
My appetite has been rather small lately, I haven't been eating too much for the last months. (Clarified to what my eating habits are.)
sleeping habits? (Clarified to What are your sleep habits?.)
I'll take my medication before bed generally and just try to get what sleep I can. My quality of sleep has been quite poor lately though. (Clarified to what my sleep habits are.)
do you feel confused?
No, not currently.
any risk for fall? (Clarified to Are you a fall risk?.)
No but I don't risk moving around too much with my usual level of pain anyway. (Clarified to if I am a fall risk.)
Have you ever been abused?
There's never been any violence in my home . . . only love. I feel very safe with my family.
do you use any hearing aids?
My hearing is good still. I've never really had trouble with it.
any chest pain?
No, my pain there is more in the lower rib area.
any shortness of breathing?
No, I don't have any breathing difficulties.
any digestion problem?
Not normally, but maybe indigestion is what's causing my recent stomach pain and constipation.
what do you take for your constipation
do you prefer hospice care?
Do you have any preferences for your hospice care?.
any bone pain?
Yes, the worst I've ever felt. I feel it all over my body, my legs, my ribs, in my bones.
when did you knew you have penicillin allergy?
What type of reaction do you have to penicillin?.
Well, I wouldn't say I have too much muscle pain, but I do feel like I've lost a lot of strength even in the past weeks.
any numbness?
No, I don't get anything like that.
did you eat something recently?
Let's see, I had a few bites of yogurt last night before bed... I think that was the last time I had anything.
do you prefer hospice care? (Clarified to Do you have any preferences for your hospice care?.)

I want to allow things to take their course . . . it's time for me to stop fighting and just enjoy the time I have left in what little ways I can. My husband and I have chosen an assisted living residence near my home where I'll go for hospice care. I have been told that they can help me with the pain there .  . . and it's close enough that my husband can be with me. (Clarified to if I have preferences about my hospice care.)
do you have advanced directives?
any skin breakdown?
Do you have skin problems?.
when did you knew you have penicillin allergy? (Clarified to What type of reaction do you have to penicillin?.)
I'm fairly certain I just got a rash when I found out I was allergic. (Clarified to what my reaction to penicillin is.)
how long have you been using morphine?
I've been taking morphine for about six months. That's when the cancer had spread to my bones and the pain was intensifying.
is that a long-acting morphine?
I take two different types of morphine. Immediate release and long-acting.
what do you think about your illness?
What do you think caused your illness?.
My morphine all comes in pill form, both the fast and slow acting.
do you have any substance abuse history?
No, I do not.
any skin breakdown? (Clarified to Do you have skin problems?.)
I wouldn't call it much of a problem but my skin has been feeling thinner than normal. (Clarified to if I have skin problems.)
have you notice any change weight?
Yes, I've lost 20 pounds or so in the past two months.
do you have denture?
No, I don't need to wear dentures.
how social activity affect your health?
how you feel about ER visit?
How do you feeling about being hospitalized?.
what do you think about your illness? (Clarified to What do you think caused your illness?.)
It's my breast cancer, I'm sure of it. (Clarified to what I think caused my illness.)
what is your perception of health?
I'd say my health is poor in general. I'm quite aware of the situation I'm in.
do you tired easily?
Yes, I'm just exhausted all the time. This pain just takes so much out of me.
sorry to hear but we will take care of you.
Thanks much for that.
You have take your hypertension and pain medication on time.
I see. Thats helpful to know.
do you know why you are at hospital?
Yes, I'm quite aware of my situation.
how you feel about ER visit? (Clarified to How do you feeling about being hospitalized?.)
The hospital medication helps some, but I can still feel pain behind. (Clarified to how I feel about being in the hospital.)
any past history of hospitalization?
Yes, but not within the past few months.
